channel.title: Project RevolutionX - #435 Revision Hyperion - Need Source + Client Coders
channel.description:
I hope I Reach My Goal Of Having The Greatest Server Alive...
[u]Source Coders[/u] -Java Is So Cool -Open -Souls -Synchr0 C0d3r -Rickey -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open [u]Client Developers[/u] -SilentCJ -DestroyNoobz -Rickey -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open [u]Client+Source Developers[/u] -RuneRage -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open -Open [u]If you want to apply, use this format.[/u] [code]Name: Age: Why you want to join?: Experience in coding?: What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Proof of experience:[/code] [u]What I want for this server:[/u] Green = Done Yellow = In Progress Red = Not Started -Vengeance -Full Combat (Range + Mage + Melee) -Multi Barrage -Full Pest Control -Full Jad -Full fight pits -Full Godsword Stances -Full Godsword Specials -Defenders Like Runescape -Godsword Dismantle + Rebuild -Anchor Stance -Anchor Special -Duel Arena 95%+ -Castle Wars -Barrows with tunnel -Melee following -Range following -Magic following -Working Obilisks -Multi-Log fix (1 Connection Per IP) -X-Log fix -Rune Knives -Full Clan Chat With Crowns -Anti Null -Anti SYI -Anti Dupe -Skilling good as Combat -RuneScape sounds in every city/town

item.title: Project RevolutionX - #435 Revision Hyperion - Need Source + Client Coders
item.dc:creator: @watch_n_lern watch n lern
item.description:
@watch_n_lern wrote:

Name: Cody
Age: 15
Why you want to join?: I have been looking forward to coding for awhile, but I am unable to host my own source to code, so I’d like to code for you.
Experience in coding?: I have been coding for about a year and have coded for several different servers.
What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: I can code both clients and servers.
Proof of experience: My previous release.
Note: This server still had a lot of coding left to do, but it went down before I could code more.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423137.0.html

Read full topic

Name: Jamal Hampton
Age: 13
Why you want to join?: I feel like its something I can really Help on. (Npc Dialogue)
Experience in coding?: I have coded a few sources, not many, but I like doing Npc Dialogue.
What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Source
Proof of experience: Dont have proof, but you give me something or ask me a couple questions or something I’m sure I can provide something.

@redbloodelf2 wrote:

Name: Jake
Age: 16
Why you want to join?: Well, i am an experienced coder and i want to try this out.
Experience in coding?: Well, i have been coding for 2 and a half years. I can code Global Objects, player data as like player spawns, teleports, Skills and Exp. ETC
What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Soruce Only, Not so good at client.
Proof of experience: Well, i ran servers as Bandos Scape Reloaded. Here’s my first server that i released.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars


The Rest i havent Released but heres some pics.

I hope I Reach My Goal Of Having The Greatest Server Alive...

If you want to apply, use this format.

Name: Age: Why you want to join?: Experience in coding?: What do you code? Source? Client? Or Both?: Proof of experience:

What I want for this server:
Green = Done
Yellow = In Progress
Red = Not Started

-Vengeance
-Full Combat (Range + Mage + Melee)
-Multi Barrage
-Full Pest Control
-Full Jad
-Full fight pits
-Full Godsword Stances
-Full Godsword Specials
-Defenders Like Runescape
-Godsword Dismantle + Rebuild
-Anchor Stance
-Anchor Special
-Duel Arena 95%+
-Castle Wars
-Barrows with tunnel
-Melee following
-Range following
-Magic following
-Working Obilisks
-Multi-Log fix (1 Connection Per IP)
-X-Log fix
-Rune Knives
-Full Clan Chat With Crowns
-Anti Null

-Anti Dupe
-Skilling good as Combat
-RuneScape sounds in every city/town
